EjsTimer

Timer Class. More...

Timer Class.

Description:
Timers manage the scheduling and execution of Ejscript functions. Timers run repeatedly until stopped by calling the stop method and are scheduled with a granularity of 1 millisecond.
API Stability:
Evolving
